title: Design Pattern Video Training
ques:
Hi,

I believe you had mentioned that there would be a Design Pattern Video training service coming. 
Where I can find these?

answers.ans:
Hi Sanjay:

Indeed, we are currently developing Online Video Training on Design Patterns and Pattern Architectures. 
The expected release date is sometime later this year. Unfortunately I cannot be more specific than that. 

Thanks for your interest and best regards.
Dan
Any news on this? Pluralsight is beckoning...

I wish these videos would already be available.. I really like your material and it would just perfect for me and some of my team if these videos were already up..
please get started :)

Hi Sanjay,

go to infoq.com under Architecture->Patterns you can find many presentations.

They are quite useful.

Regards,
Csaba
